doc:
Chuck Connors https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chuck_Connors 0 Kevin Joseph Aloysius "Chuck" Connors (April 10, 1921 – November 10, 1992) was an American actor, writer and professional basketball and baseball player. He is one of only 12 athletes in the history of American professional sports to have played both Major League Baseball and in the National Basketball Association. With a 40-year film and television career, he is best known for his five-year role as Lucas McCain in the highly rated ABC series The Rifleman (1958–63). Kevin_Joseph_Aloysius_"_Chuck_"_Connors ( April_10_,_1921 – November_10_,_1992 ) was an_American_actor_,_writer_and_professional_basketball and baseball_player . He is one of only_12_athletes in the_history of American_professional_sports to_have_played both_Major_League_Baseball and in the_National_Basketball_Association . With a_40-year_film_and_television_career , he is_best_known for his_five-year_role as Lucas_McCain in the_highly_rated_ABC_series The_Rifleman_(_1958 – 63_) .
